metadata.description: A module that allow the creation of a cached table corresponding to a form

configuration.name: table_prefix
configuration.description: A prefix we prepend to the cached tables created for a form

configuration.name: database
configuration.description: The database we wish to store the cached tables in. If it is not set, we use the main database

configuration.name: background_time
configuration.description: The time (in minutes) after which to launch the background page. You can disable the launching of the background page by setting this to be less than or equal to 0

configuration.name: stale_time
configuration.description: The time (in minutes) after which a cached table is consider stale. Setting to be less than or equal to zero means that it is always considered stale.

configuration.name: fail_time
configuration.description: The time (in minutes) after which generation of a cached table is consider to have failed

configuration.name: recache_time
configuration.description: The time (in minutes) after which the cached table is recached

configuration.name: stale_time_by_storage
configuration.description: The default stale time in minutes for a form based on its storage mechanism. If set, overides the value under times/stale_time. Setting to be less than or equal to zero means that it is always considered stale.

configuration.name: stale_time_by_form
configuration.description: The default stale time in minutes for a specific form. If set, overides the value under times/stale_time_by_storage and times/stale_time. Setting to be less than or equal to zero means that it is always considered stale.
